00021 //set your limits here
00022 var xmin = -5, xmax = 5, ymin = -5, ymax = 5;
00023 var points;
00024 var showGrid = true;
00025 var yValues = new Array();
00026 var derivatives = new Array();
00027 var canvasWidth = 400, canvasHeight = 400;
00028 var padding =3;
00029

00032 //-------------------  Listeners ---------------------------
00033     //had to add the listeners with javascript
00034     //because it's not currently possible to reference processing methods from the html
00035     
00036     //reset the graph to 0
00037     function my_reset() {
00038       for (var i = 0; i < points; i++) {
00039     
00040         yValues[i] = 0.5;
00041         derivatives[i] = 0;
00042       }
00043       setPoints();
00044     }
00045     
00046     //toggle grid
00047     function toggleGrid() {
00048       showGrid = !showGrid;
00049     }
00050     
00051     //smooth the current graph 
00052     function smooth() {
00053       var newPoints = new Array(points);
00054       for (var i = 0; i < points; i++) {
00055         var sum = 0.3 * yValues[i];
00056         sum += 0.2 * (i > 0? yValues[i-1] : yValues[i]);
00057         sum += 0.2 * (i < points-1? yValues[i+1] : yValues[i]);
00058         sum += 0.1 * (i > 1? yValues[i-2] : yValues[i]);
00059         sum += 0.1 * (i < points - 2? yValues[i+2] : yValues[i]);
00060         sum += 0.05 * (i > 2? yValues[i-3] : yValues[i]);
00061         sum += 0.05 * (i < points - 3? yValues[i+3] : yValues[i]);
00062         newPoints[i] = sum;
00063       }
00064       yValues = newPoints;
00065     }
00066

00113     //grab points from graph and print
00114  
00115     function getPoints1() {
00116       var temp = "";
00117       var temp2 = "";
00118       for(var i = 0; i < points; i++){
00119         temp += xmin + i*(xmax-xmin)/(points-1) + " ";
00120         temp += ymin + yValues[i]*(ymax - ymin) + " ";
00121         if (i!=0) { temp2 +=","};
00122         temp2 += ymin + yValues[i]*(ymax - ymin);
00123         var dx = 1.0/points * (xmax - xmin);
00124         if (i == 0)
00125           temp += (yValues[1] - yValues[0])*(ymax-ymin)/dx + "\\n";
00126         else if (i == points-1)
00127           temp += (yValues[points-1] - yValues[points-2])*(ymax-ymin)/dx + "\\n";
00128         else {
00129           var i = i;
00130           var left = Math.abs(yValues[i] - yValues[i-1]);
00131           var right = Math.abs(yValues[i+1] - yValues[i]);
00132           if (left < 1e-20 || right < 1e-20)
00133             temp += 0 + "\\n";
00134           else
00135             temp += ((1/right)*(yValues[i+1]-yValues[i]) - (1/left)*(yValues[i]-yValues[i-1]))/(2*dx*((1/right)+(1/left))) + "\\n";
00136         }
00137       }
00138       //alert("printing temp to ${appletName}_state" + temp );
00139       temp = "<xml>" + temp + "</xml>";
00140       \$('#${appletName}_state').val(temp);
00141       \$('#answerBox').val(temp2);
00142       return(temp);
00143     }
00144     
00145     //load points from y-values
00146     function setPoints1() {
00147       var tempString = \$('#answerBox').val();
00148       //alert("getting temp string from  $answerBox" + tempString );
00149       var tempPoints = tempString.split(',');
00150       var vals = new Array(tempPoints.length);
00151       for(var i = 0; i < tempPoints.length; i++){
00152         vals[i] = parseFloat(tempPoints[i]);
00153       }
00154       if (vals.length>2) points = vals.length;
00155       yValues = new Array(points);
00156       derivatives = [points];
00157       for (var i = 0; i < points; i++)
00158         yValues[i] = 0.5;
00159       for (var i = 0; i < vals.length; i++) {
00160         if (vals[i] > ymax)
00161           yValues[i] = 1;
00162         else if (vals[i] < ymin)
00163           yValues[i] = 0;
00164         else
00165           yValues[i] = (vals[i]-ymin)/(ymax-ymin);
00166       }
00167     }
00168 </script>

00172 sub insertCanvas {
00173     my $myWidth = shift() || 200;
00174     my $myHeight = shift() ||200;
00175     $canvasObject = MODES(TeX=>"canvasObject",HTML=><<END_CANVAS);
00176     <script> var canvasWidth = $myWidth; var canvasHeight = $myHeight;</script>
00177     <canvas id="cv" data-src="${webworkHtmlURL}js/sketchgraphhtml5b/SketchGraph.pjs" width="$myWidth" height="$myHeight"></canvas>  
00178 END_CANVAS
00179 # keep END_CANVAS flush left!!  
00180     return $canvasObject;
00181 }

00183 sub insertYvaluesInputBox {
00184     $yValuesInput = MODES(TeX=>"yVAluesInput",HTML=><<EOF);
00185     <p>
00186     Y-values: 
00187     <input type="text" id="points1" size=50></input>
00188     <button type="button" id="setPts" onClick="setPoints();">Set</button>
00189     </p>
00190 EOF
00191     return $yValuesInput;
00192 
00193 }

00195 sub insertGridButtons {
00196     $gridButtons = MODES(TeX=>"gridButtons",HTML=><<EOF);
00197     <button type="button" id="hideGrid" onClick="toggleGrid();">Toggle Grid</button>
00198     <button type="button" id="reset1" onClick="my_reset();">Reset to Zero</button>
00199     <button type="button" id="smooth1" onClick="smooth();">Smooth</button>
00200     <br><br>
00201 
00202 EOF
00203     return $gridButtons;
00204 }

00408 sub insertPointsArea {
00409     $pointsArea = MODES(TeX=>"pointsArea",HTML=><<EOF);
00410     <button type="button" id="getPts" onClick="getPoints();">Get Points</button><br/>
00411     <textarea id="pointDisplay" rows=10 cols=60></textarea> 
00412 EOF
00413     return $pointsArea;
00414 }
